#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

typedef unsigned long long uLL;
uLL dp[66][33];

uLL nCr(int n, int r)
{
    if(n==r)
        return dp[n][r]=1;
    if(r==0)
        return dp[n][r]=1;
    if(r==1)
        return dp[n][r]=(uLL)n;
    if(dp[n][r])
        return dp[n][r];
    return dp[n][r]=nCr(n-1, r)+nCr(n-1, r-1);
}

int main()
{
    int test=1;
    //scanf("%d", &test);
    while(test--)
    {
        int n, r;
        scanf("%d %d", &n, &r);
        int temp=n+r;
        r=min(r, n);
        printf("%llu\n", nCr(temp, r));
    }
}
